########################################################################
# Include python install macros
########################################################################
include(GrPython)
if(NOT PYTHONINTERP_FOUND)
    return()
endif()

########################################################################
# Install python sources
########################################################################
GR_PYTHON_INSTALL(
    FILES
    __init__.py
    pulse_detect.py
    pulse_extract.py
    pdw_to_file.py
    usrp_power_cal_table.py
    virtual_power_cal_table.py
    pdw_plot.py
    DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/pdw
)

install(FILES b210_pdw.pickle DESTINATION ${GR_PYTHON_DIR}/pdw)

########################################################################
# Handle the unit tests
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

set(GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-pdw)
set(GR_TEST_PYTHON_DIRS ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/swig)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pulse_detect ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pulse_detect.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pulse_extract ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pulse_extract.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pdw_to_file ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pdw_to_file.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_usrp_power_cal_table ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_usrp_power_cal_table.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_virtual_power_cal_table ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_virtual_power_cal_table.py)
GR_ADD_TEST(qa_pdw_plot ${PYTHON_EXECUTABLE} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_pdw_plot.py)
